qas.question: Children inherited polish nobility from whom?
What does an individual do to attain ennoblement?
WHo could naturalize a polish noble?
What is another name for ennoblement?
WHat is another name for polish noble?

context: All children of the Polish nobility inherited their noble status from a <a0_0>noble mother and father<a0_0/>. Any individual could attain ennoblement (<a3_0>nobilitacja<a3_0/>) for <a1_0>special services to the state<a1_0/>. A foreign noble might be naturalised as a Polish noble (Polish: "<a4_0>indygenat<a4_0/>") by the <a2_0>Polish king<a2_0/> (later, from 1641, only by a general sejm).
